conbody.p: The following table is used in "Configuring a Directory" and "Configuring a Kafka Consumer"-- no longer used by Kafka Consumer:

row.entry:
Type of content in JSON files. Use one of the following options:
Array of Objects
Multiple Objects

Maximum number of characters in a JSON object.
Longer objects are diverted to the pipeline for error handling.

p.draft-comment: The following IgnoreControlChar-row is used in Configuring a - Directory, File Tail, Kafka Consumer, JSON Parser, Log Parser:

row.entry: Removes all ASCII control characters except for the tab, line feed, and carriage return characters.from ReusableTables.dita.

p.draft-comment: The following rows are used in the Data Collector Console - Overview,

strow.stentry: Provides context-sensitive help based on the information in the panel.
